name: chia-rpc
description: Multi-file boilerplate for Open API Specification.

scripts.test: npm run build && spectral lint build/%m_config_file%.yaml
scripts.preview: npm run build && redoc-cli serve build/%npm_config_file%.yaml --options.onlyRequiredInSamples
scripts.html: npm run build && redoc-cli bundle build/%npm_config_file%.yaml --output build/redoc/%npm_config_file%.html --options.theme.colors.primary.main=green
